title: suzuri
author: suzuri
content: Just found out wallet.dat from 2013, but i dont remember the full password, i tried to bruteforce it with bitrecover, but tried about 100k passwords and it still didnt worked, please help.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: suzuri on November 24, 2022, 06:48:31 PMJust found out wallet.dat from 2013, but i dont remember the full password, i tried to bruteforce it with bitrecover, but tried about 100k passwords and it still didnt worked, please help.The best solution would be to bruteforce it and get your private keys. Â Then just recover in any wallet...Be careful about anyone who request your file.by handing over your file in the forum there is a considerable risk of being scammed.I never used, but this service is very popular, and they might help you:https://www.walletrecoveryservices.com/

comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Do you mean btcrecover rather than bitrecover? I'm not aware of any relevant software by the name of bitrecover.Your only options are either:1 - Share with us as much as you can remember about your password and what you have tried so far, and we can try creating a new tokenlist file to widen your search.2 - Pay for a professional recovery service as bitmover has suggested.
